DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess retinal nerve fiber layer thickness macular thickness measure optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) patient infect HIV virus without ocular manifestation correlate result perimetric finding assess frequency double technology perimetry ( FDT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Anatomic Visual Function Assessments Asymptomatic HIV-positive Patients
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis AIDS Bestcorrected visual acuity 20/25 well Refractive error 0±5.0 diopter astigmatism 0±3.0 diopter Normal intraocular pressure ( ≤21mmHg ) Cataract visible medium opacity HIVrelated infectious retinopathy Risk factor development glaucoma
